job.title: Entry Level Software Engineer
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Higher Education,Computer Software
job.description:
Company Description
As a national nonprofit focused on developing the next generation of tech talent, LaunchCode is working with this partner to create a special on-ramp program for people who have the skills to work in technology, but just need an opportunity.
Come and join us to start your tech journey. Apply to be considered today!
We only accept applications through
our website
(https://www.launchcode.org/job-postings/saint-louis/entry-level-software-developer).
Job Description
We only accept applications through
our website
(https://www.launchcode.org/job-postings/saint-louis/entry-level-software-developer).
Qualifications
We're Looking For Candidates Who Have:
The passion drive and aptitude to succeed in technology.
Tech skills to build a project with one of the following languages:
Java, with bonus points for Spring MVC
JavaScript, with bonus points for Angular, Node JS or React framework
Python
C#.NET
Ruby on Rails
A completed project or portfolio of work to showcase to employers.
The ability to work full-time in the United States.
What We Offer
Compensation of $20 per hour
Health Insurance and other benefits
Mentorship from an experienced programmer
An opportunity to fast-track the standard IT hiring experience for Entry Level Software Developers
We only accept applications through
our website
(https://www.launchcode.org/job-postings/saint-louis/entry-level-software-developer).
Additional Information
We Heart Diversity
LaunchCode supports and fosters leadership from underrepresented communities. We strongly encourage folks from immigrant communities and communities of color, as well as those who identify as women, LGBTQ, or under-resourced to apply. LaunchCode is an Equal Employment Opportunity Employer. Program and employment policies of LaunchCode are nondiscriminatory in regard to race, color, gender, religion, age, national origin, disability, veteran status, or sexual orientation.
